name: KEYSMASH (malmorsus)
description:
For the intended experience please switch to the English keyboard layout! 

Make your keyboard a true weapon - type your own sword, infuse it with special abilities, and try to survive the onslaught. Prove how fast you can keysmash! 

  • RMB - movement (click to set a waypoint or click and hold to follow the cursor) 
  • SPACE - dash towards the waypoint 
  • LMB - attack 

* Note that the order of letters in special words does not matter to provide a better keysmash experience. For example, the words 'FIRE' and 'WTIEFMAR' are both viable for the fire effect.

Also recommend playing in full screen mode, but this ultimately is up to you ;)

The music is made by: 

Pandemic (2021 Remix) by CHRISRGMFB https://chrisrgmfb.com Promoted by @RoyaltyFreePlanet - https://royaltyfreeplanet.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 http://bit.ly/RFP_CClicense
